author: Anonymous Mouse
title: functions definition
question: The questions after functions definition video are supposed to be missing on edX or is there any error there?
instructor_answer:
Edx keeps magically deleting questions when we restart the course.  Friday they finally gave us a theory about how and why this happens, but it was too late for this term.
So they are NOT supposed to be missing.  But we do know they are missing.  Apologies.
